product_name: New Balance W019 Fitness Slip-On Shoes - Women's
long_description: The New Balance W019 Fitness Slip-On Shoes are designed to be tough enough to handle the most intense workouts, yet chic enough to withstand your post-workout social gathering. Bungee closure system resembles laces but provides an easy-on and easy-off alternative when you're in a hurry. Flexible platform accommodates your pre- and post-workout yoga stretching. Lightweight cushioned midsoles absorb shock; REVlite midsoles provide premium responsiveness and durability while weighing less than many other midsole materials. The New Balance W019 Fitness Slip-On Shoes are shaped to provide a glovelike fit for the entire foot.
short_description: The New Balance W019 Fitness Slip-On Shoes are designed to be tough enough to handle the most intense workouts, yet chic enough to withstand your post-workout social gathering.
